original_text: Then the three disciples asked Jesus, ‘Why do the teachers of God's Law say that God's prophet Elijah must return first, before the Messiah comes?’
korean_text: 이에 예수께 묻자와 이르되 어찌하여 서기관들이 엘리야가 먼저 와야 하리라 하나이까

sentences.original_text: Then the three disciples asked Jesus
Why do the teachers of God's Law say
that God's prophet Elijah must return first
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 선지자 엘리야가 먼저 돌아와야 한다고
